basics.name: Oliver Zhang
basics.summary: Versatile engineer with expertise in developing highly integrated electro‑mechanical systems. Deep understanding of the product development process. Thrives in fast-paced, highly collaborative teams.

work.name: PA Consulting
work.summary: Collaborating with diverse engineers and designers to find the path through complex challenges and turn inventive ideas into innovative products.
highlights: Delivering projects across many different industries, from medical robotics to industrial food production.
Breaking complex problems down into key interactions to model and analyze them with first principles.
Building the team's software and firmware engineering abilities through weekly forums and training sessions.
The team's go-to expert for robotics, programming, and analysis.

work.name: Autel Robotics
work.summary: Implemented tracking and gesture recognition systems for embedded execution on a quadcopter.

education.area:
Mechanical Engineering with an additional major in Robotics
With University Honors
courses: Completed a wide range of course work from mechanical engineering fundamentals to computer vision, artificial intelligence, and systems engineering.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
